Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 76th/Greenwood
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Greenwood, 75th, South Chicago, 76th and Stony Island due to street blockage near 76th/Greenwood.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute near Pulaski/Arthington
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses temp. rerouted NB Pulaski, Roosevelt, Independence, Congress Pkwy and Pulaski; SB Pulaski, Harrison, Independence, Roosevelt and Pulaski

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Pulaski/Arthington, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Pulaski, Roosevelt, Independence, Congress Pkwy and Pulaski.

Southbound buses will operate via Pulaski, Harrison, Independence, Roosevelt and Pulaski

Allow extra travel time.
